name: Moonchild Naga
description: The Moonchild Naga is a large serpent-like creature with a graceful form embodying a blend of serpentine grace and eldritch power.
memorable: Its ability to return to life through Rejuvenation adds a unique tactical challenge in combat.
goals: Typically seeks to manipulate and control others, using its spells to deceive.
relations: May have allegiances with other evil creatures or cultists.
environment: Often found in dark, secluded areas or magical locales where it can harness its powers.
strengths: Immune to poison damage and charmed conditions, enhancing its survivability in battles.
attacks: Attacks include a venomous bite and constricting grapple, while it also possesses a gaze attack that can stun.
most_powerful_ability: Rejuvenation allows it to revive after death if not prevented by a wish spell.
skills: Proficient in Deception and Persuasion, making it an effective manipulator.
additional_information: Can cast spells innately without needing components.
Possesses a high Charisma score, aiding in spellcasting.
Has spells that control or deceive, like charm person and dominate beast.
Includes a damaging bite attack that deals both piercing and poison damage.
Starry Gaze can stun a target, adding complexity to combat encounters.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting based on Charisma with spells for manipulation and control.
test_queries: serpent creature with powerful gaze attack
naga that can return to life
